description: Selvanayagam Gnanasegaran Vs M. Abeygunasekara Principal, Kandy Girls High School And other before Hon.D.N. Samarakoon, J
parties: Selvanayagam Gnanasegaran Vs M. Abeygunasekara Principal, Kandy Girls High School And other
keywords: The refusal of the admission of a child of Methodist Denomination to Girls’ High School of Kandy - The origin of what came to be known as “Assisted Schools” and the circumstances under which they vested in the state (then the Crown) in 1961 – the Wesleyan Methodist Mission – the two Acts of 1960 and 1961 – force; counter force and prudence -religious ratios –– A Sacred Agreement in Perpetuity – Articles 16, 167, 168 of the Constitution 1978 – the application of religious ratios – the lackadaisical attitude of some to implement religious ratios provisions – confusion created by what could be a surreptitious suppression or ignorance – a transgression of the principle of the rule of law – judicial review
